    <div class="cc03" id="e5">
     <p align="center" dir="ltr" style="margin-right: 0px">
      <font face="Lucida Sans">
       Pipe Plus, Inc., a premiere distributor of quality PVC, water, sewer and drain pipes and fittings, is located in Leominster, Massachusetts  
 		and has served the New England region since 1983. We provide products and services to municipalities and contractors.  We have  
 		one of the largest, single-branch inventories in our industry. We carry a wide variety of products, which are developed by the leading  
 		manufacturers in our industry, to cover the various projects our customers may have. Our success has been driven by our  
 		continued commitment to customer satisfaction and providing high quality products at competitive pricing.
      </font>
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="cc01" id="e4">

      651 Lancaster Street

      Leominster, MA 01453
